attributes.action: To hold an independent investigation into the management of public money and resource planning in the NHS, with the aim of preventing the build up of under achieving and overpaid managers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If one uses the NHS for any length of time, one can see that each area/department pushes the patient from one to the other, with too many grey areas. The British people deserve a more structured and efficient health service. The jobs for life with an index linked pension must be stopped and poor managers should be dismissed with no golden handshake and a reduced pension rights.
